lines.line: Little Whiskers never imagined life without his mother.
They used to play together every day.
But one rainy day, his mother never came home.
Whiskers waited, hiding under furniture, hoping she would return.
Days passed as he watched the world outside.
Sometimes he'd try to play, but his heart wasn't in it.
Nights were the hardest, when loneliness brought tears to his eyes.
If you've ever felt alone, remember there's always someone who understands. Adopt a shelter cat today.

parsed_script.full_script: Little Whiskers never imagined life without his mother.  They used to play together every day.  And cuddle during cold nights.  But one rainy day, his mother never came home.  Whiskers waited, hiding under furniture, hoping she would return.  Days passed as he watched the world outside.  Sometimes he'd try to play, but his heart wasn't in it.  Nights were the hardest, when loneliness brought tears to his eyes.  If you've ever felt alone, remember there's always someone who understands. Adopt a shelter cat today.
